en-US: We apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you for your understanding! We're also inviting you to join our community to stay updated on the latest news and developments. With all your excitement, we're gonna meet you on mobile devices soon!
zh-CN: 我们为给您带来的不便表示歉意。感谢您的理解！我们还邀请您加入我们的社区，以便及时了解最新消息和动态。期待与您在移动设备上见面！
